author: Justine Calma
title: What happens when extreme heat collides with a pandemic?
description: Extreme heat can be deadly, especially for people stuck indoors without air conditioning. As people shelter in place during the COVID-19 pandemic, figuring out how to safely beat the heat has become a bigger challenge.
content:
Were about to find out 
Photo by Avijit Ghosh/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images
The COVID-19 pandemic is on the verge of colliding with another public health threat: extreme heat, which kills more people in the US each year than any other weather-rel… [+6591 chars]
